a doctor who specializes in rheumatology (= the study of conditions that make the joints swell): You might have to consult a rheumatologist who specializes in arthritis. In his work as a rheumatologist, he often sees patients in desperate pain from gout. Related word
rheumatology
More examplesFewer examplesIt is best to consult a rheumatologist, especially one specializing in gout.Rheumatologists often recommend tai chi for relieving pain from osteoarthritis and fibromyalgia. I've been referred to a rheumatologist, a neurologist, and an HRT expert for my symptoms.
